import React, { useState } from "react"; import ReactDOM from "react-dom"; import "./loginsignup.css"; import { Navbar, Container, Nav, NavDropdown, Form, FormControl, Button, Row, Col, } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import loginimg from "../../Assets/images/loginimg.png"; import note from "../../Assets/images/note.png"; import google from "../../Assets/images/google.svg"; // import loginimg from "../../Assets/images/loginimg.png"; function Login() { const renderForm = ( <>

Welcome back.

Sign in with Google

Or, sign in with your email

Email address {renderErrorMessage("uname")}
Password {renderErrorMessage("pass")}
Forgot password?
{/* */}

Don’t have an account? Sign up now

); return (
Sign In
{isSubmitted ?
User is successfully logged in
: renderForm}
); } export default Login;
